    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This is the UI Class' main function that will be run when you run this file it is in a do-while loop in case restart program is toggled on else it will just end.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • runUI

        public static void runUI()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        runUI runs the acutual election, this will go through each prompt and ask for user input, or take in a string if you are in testing mode.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • promptFiles

        public static void promptFiles(java.lang.String input)
        This method prompts which ballot files are going to be in the election.
        Parameters:
        input - - used during testing, the file(s) name being passed in.

      • promptVoteType

        public static void promptVoteType(java.lang.String input)
        This method prompts what type of election is to be had.
        Parameters:
        input - - used during testing, either a 1 or 2 depending on the election type.

      • promptNumSeats

        public static void promptNumSeats(java.lang.String input)
        This method asks for the number of seats in the election and sets numSeats to that number.
        Parameters:
        input - - used during testing, the number of seats up during the election.

      • confirmInput

        public static boolean confirmInput(java.lang.String input)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        This method is ran after all election prompts have gone. It will ask for a confirmation that the information entered before is correct.
        Parameters:
        input - - used during testing, either a 1 or 2 depending on the election type.
        Returns:
        boolean - used during testing, if confirmation runs fine then it will return true, else false that something unexpected happened.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • displayHelp

        public static void displayHelp(java.lang.String input)
        This method displays the helpmenu that will go over how to enter information in each prompt.
        Parameters:
        input - - used during testing, passes in a 'x' which means you should restart the program to the beginning.

      • quitProgram

        public static void quitProgram(boolean quit)
        This method ends the program.
        Parameters:
        quit - - used during testing, this is used if the program is exited properly then it will return true.

      • displayResults

        public static boolean displayResults()
        This method displays the Results of the election, getting all the information about the election and printing it on screen.
        Returns:
        boolean - used during testing, this is used to see if the function has a return type of true meaning it ran successfully, or if an error is caught it will return false meaning that the method failed at some point.

      • isNumeric

        public static boolean isNumeric(java.lang.String str)
        This method takes in a str and checks if the string is a number or not
        Parameters:
        str - - string to be checked if it a str of just numbers or not.
        Returns:
        boolean - returns true if it is a number, and false if it is not a number.
